DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety BTDS compare placebo subject moderate severe low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison BTDS ( Buprenorphine Transdermal System ) Placebo Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety buprenorphine transdermal system ( BTDS ) compare placebo subject moderate severe low back pain sub-optimal response non-opioid analgesic treatment require opioid analgesic pain control .
DOC.criteria: Males female age 20 year old . Clinical diagnosis low back pain 4 week longer nonmalignant pain etiology . Subjects current chronic disease ( ) past history high possibility relapse , addition low back pain , require frequent analgesic therapy ( e.g . headache , fibromyalgia , gout , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoarthritis diabetic neuropathy ) .
